articles.description: Ruud van Nistelrooy doesn't know how long he will have as interim coach of Manchester United, but he was determined to enjoy his time in the dugout on Wednesday.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruud van Nistelrooy enjoys 'celebration of a man living a new reality - even if just for a moment'

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says Manchester City have "13 players" and are in "trouble" after his side suffers more injuries in the League Cup defeat at Tottenham on Wednesday.
articles.title: 'We have 13 players, we are in trouble' -  Guardiola fears for Man City

articles.description: Spurs manager Ange Postecoglou stays on course to keep promise of second-season silverware as Manchester City are beaten in the Carabao Cup.
articles.title: Tottenham 2-1 Man City: Spurs boss Ange Postecoglou could yet keep prize promise after EFL Cup win

articles.description: Unbeaten Aberdeen make their biggest statement yet by intensifying the pressure on Rangers with an enthralling Scottish Premiership win.
articles.title: Aberdeen vs Rangers: Scottish Premiership - BBC Sport

articles.description: Cody Gakpo scores twice to send Liverpool into the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup as the holders win at Brighton.
articles.title: Gakpo scores twice as holders Liverpool beat Brighton to progress

articles.description: England cricket captain Ben Stokes says a masked gang burgled his home  - when his wife and two children were there - while he was in Pakistan for the recent Test series.
articles.title: Ben Stokes: England captain's home targeted by masked gang

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Preston North End vs Arsenal in the League Cup
articles.title: Arsenal advance in Carabao Cup with comfortable win at Preston

articles.description: Manchester United will visit Tottenham Hotspur in the Carabao Cup quarter-finals, while Liverpool face Southampton.
articles.title: Carabao Cup quarter-final draw: Spurs play Man Utd and Liverpool face Southampton,

articles.description: Celtic continue their unbeaten start to the Scottish Premiership season with an ultimately comfortable victory over Dundee.
articles.title: Celtic v Dundee: Scottish Premiership - BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Newcastle United vs Chelsea in the League Cup
articles.title: Newcastle United vs Chelsea: League Cup - BBC Sport
